HOUSE BILL/RESOLUTION HISTORY
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00696
ADOPTED AS RESOLUTION NO. HR00035
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING LAVRENTE INDICO DIAZ (LAV DIAZ), THE DIRECTOR, SCREENWRITER, CINEMATOGRAPHER AND EDITOR OF THE MOVIE "ANG BABAENG HUMAYO", AS WELL AS THE ACTORS AND PRODUCERS THEREOF, FOR WINNING THE GOLDEN LION FOR BEST FILM AWARD IN THE 73RD VENICE INTERNATIONAL FILM FESTIVAL
